description:
Akira is a quiet and somewhat taciturn member of Shipon`s class as well as Yayoi`s roommate. Though she becomes irritated easily when around people too much, she learns to enjoy spending time with Yayoi, Shipon, Alisa and the others of their group. [Spoiler]Late in the series, she starts dating JoJo.[/Spoiler]
(Wikipedia)
name: Kayama Akira
